`,(0,s.jsxDEV)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:(0,s.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"javascript","data-theme":"default",raw:`// \uAD00\uCC30 \uB300\uC0C1\uC790(Subject)
class Subject {
  constructor() {
    // \uAD00\uCC30\uC790\uB4E4\uC744 \uB2F4\uC744 \uBC30\uC5F4
    this.observers = [];
  }

  // \uBC30\uC5F4\uC5D0 \uCD94\uAC00
  subscribe(observer) {
    this.observers.push(observer);
    console.log(\`\${observer.obsName}\uB2D8\uC774 \uAD6C\uB3C5 \uD588\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4.\`);
  }

  // \uBC30\uC5F4\uC5D0\uC11C \uC0AD\uC81C
  unsubscribe(observer) {
    this.observers.splice(this.observers.indexOf(observer), 1);
    console.log(\`\${observer.obsName}\uB2D8\uC774 \uAD6C\uB3C5\uC744 \uCDE8\uC18C \uD588\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4.\`);
  }

  // \uBAA8\uB4E0 \uAD00\uCC30\uC790\uB4E4\uC5D0\uAC8C \uC774\uBCA4\uD2B8 \uC1A1\uC2E0
  notifyAll() {
    this.observers.forEach((observer) => observer.update());
  }
}

// \uAD00\uCC30\uC790(\uC635\uC800\uBC84)
class Observer {
  constructor(obsName) {
    this.obsName = obsName;
  }

  update() {
    console.log(\`\${this.obsName}\uB2D8, Apple\uC774 \uC0C8\uB85C\uC6B4 \uC601\uC0C1\uC744 \uC5C5\uB85C\uB4DC \uD588\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4!\`);
  }
}
